command.label: Publish Page and Blocks
command.partofapproval: Is part of an active approval sequence and cannot be published at the moment

blockenhancements.noitemstopublish: There is nothing to be published
blockenhancements.currentcontenttopublish: There are no unpublished content items related to this content. Only the current content item can be published.

dialog.title: Confirm publishing the page with related content items
dialog.confirmation:
There are unpublished content items used by the current content.
Choose the ones that you would like to publish simultaneously.

inlinereadytopublish.success: was marked as Ready to Publish successfully
